content:
As an AI language model, I don't have emotions or personal preferences like human beings. However, based on public opinion and popular film reviews, some of the most loved and critically acclaimed movies from Pixar are:

- Toy Story (1995)
- Monsters, Inc. (2001)
- Finding Nemo (2003)
- The Incredibles (2004)
- Wall-E (2008)
- Up (2009)
- Toy Story 3 (2010)
- Inside Out (2015)
- Coco (2017)
- Soul (2020)

These movies are known for their heartwarming stories, innovative animation techniques, and memorable characters. Each one reflects Pixar's commitment to storytelling, creativity, and technological innovation.
